name: Macro
description: A Private Layer for the Internet Macro is a private, intelligent, user-owned layer for the internet. The browser is your front door to a complete privacy ecosystem. Most browsers are just windows to the web. Macro is differentâ€”it's a protective layer that sits between you and everything online. Tab-aware private AI, a signing sandbox for wallet security, mesh P2P VPN with verifiable routes, Privacy Profiles for identity isolation, encrypted communications, multi-network Web3 depth, and a privacy mixer. All built in. No plugins required.
